attributes.name: Mac Catalyst
attributes.description: Capability to migrate apps to macOS platform

attributes.name: Data Protection
attributes.description: Data protection allows an app that accesses sensitive user data to use the built-in encryption available on some devices.

attributes.name: Maps
attributes.description: The MapKit framework provides an interface for embedding maps directly into your own windows and views of your app.

attributes.name: Wireless Accessory Configuration
attributes.description: The Wireless Accessory Configuration capability allows an app to configure MFi Wi-Fi accessories.

attributes.name: App Groups
attributes.description: App groups gives multiple apps access to shared containers and allows certain additional communication between the apps.

attributes.name: HomeKit
attributes.description: HomeKit allows users to manage connected accessories in their home using an app.

attributes.name: Inter-App Audio
attributes.description: Inter-App Audio allows an app to send audio to and receive audio from other Inter-App Audio-enabled apps.

attributes.name: Increased Memory Limit
attributes.description: Enables an app to exceed the default app memory limit on supported devices.

attributes.name: AutoFill Credential Provider
attributes.description: The AutoFill credential provider allows an app to provide user names and passwords for AutoFill in Safari and other apps, with user permission.

attributes.name: HealthKit
attributes.description: HealthKit allows an app to read and write health and activity user data that appears in the Health app.

attributes.name: Game Center
attributes.description: Game Center allows players to connect to the Game Center service, enabling them to interact with their friends, view leader boards, or play head to head in your game.

attributes.name: Game Center

attributes.name: Data Protection
attributes.description: Data protection allows an app that accesses sensitive user data to use the built-in encryption available on some devices.

attributes.name: App Groups
attributes.description: App groups gives multiple apps access to shared containers and allows certain additional communication between the apps.
